genericError.title: <:pomerror:1397677382214615161> Ocorreu um erro
genericError.desc: Desculpe, algo deu errado. Isso é tudo que sabemos.
genericError.desc_detailed: Desculpe, algo deu errado. Isso é tudo que sabemos.

serverError.title: <:servererror:1397678354039312424> Erro de servidor
serverError.desc: Desculpe, algo deu errado do nosso lado.
serverError.desc_detailed: Desculpe, algo deu errado do nosso lado.

userError.title: <:confused:1397678924011409542> Isso não parece certo
userError.desc: Parece que você fez algo errado.
userError.desc_detailed: Parece que você fez algo errado.

syntaxError.title: <:confused:1397678924011409542> Isso não parece certo
syntaxError.desc: A sintaxe correta para esse comando é:
syntaxError.desc_detailed: A sintaxe correta para esse comando é:

notFound.title: <:searchoff:1397680383641911418> Não Encontrado
notFound.desc: Não encontramos o que você está procurando.
notFound.desc_detailed: Não consegui encontrar o {{resource}} que você estava procurando.

blocked.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Bloqueado
blocked.desc: Você está bloqueado de realizar essa ação.
blocked.desc_detailed: Você está bloqueado de realizar essa ação para: {{reason}}.

invalidLocation.title: <:wronglocation:1397680782876606584> Você não pode usar isso aqui
invalidLocation.desc: Essa ação não pode ser usada aqui.
invalidLocation.desc_detailed: Essa ação não pode ser usada aqui, usá-la em {{location}}.

userCooldown.title: <:hourglass:1397681368439193620> Vai com calma!
userCooldown.desc: Você está fazendo isso rápido demais.
userCooldown.desc_detailed: Você está fazendo isso rápido demais. Por favor, espere {{time}} antes de tentar novamente.

guildCooldown.title: <:hourglass:1397681368439193620> Vai com calma!
guildCooldown.desc: Essa ação foi feita recentemente neste servidor.
guildCooldown.desc_detailed: Essa ação foi feita recentemente neste servidor. Por favor espere {{time}} antes de tentar novamente.

userAuthority.title: <:authority:1397687694108131419> Autoridade do Usuário
userAuthority.desc: A pessoa em que você está tentando executar uma ação tem mais autoridade do que você.
userAuthority.desc_detailed: {{user}} tem mais autoridade do que você. Você não pode executar essa ação.

missingPermission.title: <:permissions:1397681744181985331> Permissão ausente
missingPermission.desc: You don't have permission to perform that action.
missingPermission.desc_detailed: You need {{permission}} to perform that action.

botMissingPermission.title: <:permissions:1397681744181985331> Missing Permission
botMissingPermission.desc: I don't have permission to perform that action.
botMissingPermission.desc_detailed: I need {{permission}} to perform that action.

wrongTarget.title: <:wrongperson:1397687936602079382> Wrong Target
wrongTarget.desc_detailed: That's not for you. That's for {{target}}.

devOnly.title: <:pomelo:1397688084858142802> Developer Only
devOnly.desc: That feature is only available to developers.
devOnly.desc_detailed: That feature is only available to developers.

maintenanceMode.title: <:construction:1397688310335537202> Maintenance
maintenanceMode.desc: I'm currently in maintenance mode, features are temporarily paused. Try again later.
maintenanceMode.desc_detailed: My features are temporarily paused due to {{reason}}. Try again later.

invalidBoolean.title: <:boolean:1397688720496525402> Invalid Boolean
invalidBoolean.desc: That's not a valid boolean. Try 'true' or 'false'.
invalidBoolean.desc_detailed: That's not a valid boolean. Try 'true' or 'false'.

invalidNumber.title: <:number:1397688864897892423> Invalid Number
invalidNumber.desc: That's not a valid number. Try a number.
invalidNumber.desc_detailed: That's not a valid number. Try a number.

invalidString.title: <:string:1397689028039675914> Invalid Text
invalidString.desc: That's not a valid string. Try some text.
invalidString.desc_detailed: That's not a valid string. Try a(n) {{string_type}}.

invalidOption.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Invalid Option
invalidOption.desc: That's not a valid option. Try one of the options.
invalidOption.desc_detailed: That's not a valid option. Try something like '{{option}}'.

invalidChannel.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Invalid Channel
invalidChannel.desc: That's not a valid channel. Try something like '#channel' or '1234567890123456789'.
invalidChannel.desc_detailed: That's not a valid channel. Try something like '#channel' or '1234567890123456789'.

invalidRole.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Invalid Role
invalidRole.desc: That's not a valid role. Try something like '@role' or '1234567890123456789'.
invalidRole.desc_detailed: That's not a valid role. Try something like '@role' or '1234567890123456789'.

invalidMention.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Invalid Mention
invalidMention.desc: That's not a valid mention/user ID. Try something like '@person' or '1234567890123456789'.
invalidMention.desc_detailed: That's not a valid mention. Try something like '@person' or '1234567890123456789'.

invalidDuration.title: <:hourglassoff:1397692063658545152> Invalid Duration
invalidDuration.desc: That's not a valid duration. Try something like '10s' or '10m'.
invalidDuration.desc_detailed: That's not a valid duration. Try something like '10s' or '10m'.

durationTooLong.title: <:hourglassoff:1397692063658545152> Duration Too Long
durationTooLong.desc: That's too long. Try something shorter.
durationTooLong.desc_detailed: That's too long. Try something shorter than {{length}}.

durationTooShort.title: <:hourglassoff:1397692063658545152> Duration Too Short
durationTooShort.desc: That's too short. Try something longer.
durationTooShort.desc_detailed: That's too short. Try something longer than {{length}}.

stringTooLong.title: <:string:1397689028039675914> String Too Long
stringTooLong.desc: That's too long. Try something shorter.
stringTooLong.desc_detailed: That's too long. Try something shorter than {{length}} characters.

stringTooShort.title: <:string:1397689028039675914> String Too Short
stringTooShort.desc: That's too short. Try something longer.
stringTooShort.desc_detailed: That's too short. Try something longer than {{length}} characters.

numberTooLarge.title: <:number:1397688864897892423> Number Too Large
numberTooLarge.desc: That number is too large. Try something smaller.
numberTooLarge.desc_detailed: That number is too large. Try something smaller than {{length}}.

numberTooSmall.title: <:number:1397688864897892423> Number Too Small
numberTooSmall.desc: That number is too small. Try something larger.
numberTooSmall.desc_detailed: That number is too small. Try something larger than {{length}}.

invalidType.title: <:block:1397680563040817152> Invalid Type
invalidType.desc: That's not what I was expecting.
invalidType.desc_detailed: I was expecting a(n) {{expected}}, but I received {{received}}.

invalidAttachment.title: <:attachmenterror:1397690751680254042> Invalid Attachment
invalidAttachment.desc: That's not a valid attachment or not a supported file type.
invalidAttachment.desc_detailed: That's not a valid attachment or not a supported file type. Make sure it's one of the supported file types: `{{types}}`.

notInGuild.title: <:wronglocation:1397680782876606584> You can't use that here
notInGuild.desc: That action is only available in a guild.
notInGuild.desc_detailed: That action is only available in a guild.

fileTooLarge.title: <:attachmenterror:1397690751680254042> File Too Large
fileTooLarge.desc: That file is too large. Try something smaller.
fileTooLarge.desc_detailed: That file is too large. Try something smaller than {{length}}.

noEmail.title: <:noemail:1397690990399193128> No Email
noEmail.desc: No email found for this account.
noEmail.desc_detailed: No email found for this account.

noneFound.title: <:searchoff:1397680383641911418> None Found
noneFound.desc: The resource(s) you were looking for couldn't be found.
noneFound.desc_detailed: The {{resource}} you were looking for couldn't be found.

missingScopes.title: <:pomwarning:1397677600012501042> Missing Scopes
missingScopes.desc: You need to grant all the required scopes to use this feature.
missingScopes.desc_detailed: You need to grant all the required scopes to use this feature.
